name: VR - Zombie Shooter
description:
*** Best VR Zombie game in the market ***
*** Hordes of bloody zombies are attacking at your from the graveyard ***
*** FPS VR Shooter game for all cardboard compatible headsets ***
*** Amazing graphics quality, horror sound effects and music ***

Zombies have killed the priest, stolen the holly cross from the church which protects the land from evil creatures. Your mission is to kill all zombies and return the cross to the church.

How to play:
- Stare where you want to move. It is so easy
- Kill approaching zombies just by targeting them. There will be an indicator for aiming and shooting
- After killing all zombies return the cross to the church

Please help us improving this VR game by leaving your comments and votes on the store.
